trans-unit.source: Represents the security settings for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding"></xref>.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> class is designed for interoperation with services that implement WS-* specifications.
The transport security for this binding is Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) over HTTP, or HTTPS.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity"></xref> class.
Gets the message-level security settings for this binding.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NonDualMessageSecurityOverHttp"></xref> instance.

The default value includes: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.NonDualMessageSecurityOverHttp.EstablishSecurityContext"></xref> with default set to `true`, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverHttp.ClientCredentialType"></xref> is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageCredentialType.Windows"></xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverHttp.AlgorithmSuite"></xref> is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite.Basic256"></xref>, and <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverHttp.NegotiateServiceCredential"></xref> is `true`.
Specifies the message <xref href="System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode"></xref> for this binding.

This property determines whether the settings from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> and/or <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Message%2A> property buckets may or may not become effective.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode"></xref> for this binding.
The default is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode.Message"></xref>.
The value of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Mode"></xref> set is not defined.
Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Message"></xref> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
This is used by [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] for XAML integration.
`true` if the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Message"></xref> property value should be serialized; otherwise, `false`.
Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Mode"></xref> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
This is used by [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] for XAML integration.
`true` if the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Mode"></xref> property value should be serialized; otherwise, `false`.
Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Transport"></xref> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
`true` if the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSHttpSecurity.Transport"></xref> property value should be serialized; otherwise, `false`.
Gets an object that contains the transport-level security settings for this binding.
You can use the object returned by this property to set the transport security settings for the binding.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity"></xref> for this binding.

The default value includes a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ClientCredentialType"></xref> of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType.None"></xref> and a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ProxyCredentialType"></xref> of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.HttpProxyCredentialType.None"></xref>.
